speakers.name: Ebba Fröling
speakers.description: Ebba is the co-founder and COO of Mycorena - a Swedish company that specializes in sustainable food innovation and production.  Founded in 2017, their primary focus is on developing and producing alternative protein sources using fungi-based fermentation technologies.

speakers.name: Dan Börjesson
speakers.description: Owner of Pelagic Seafood Sweden AB, we take care of the residual current from the pelagic fishes.

speakers.name: Lars Uno Bryngeld
speakers.description: Owner of Pelagic Seafood Sweden AB, we take care of the residual current from the pelagic fishes.

speakers.name: Linda Högbacka
speakers.role: Head of YESBOX - home of entrepreneurs
speakers.description: Head of a community of startups and innovators at Business region Gothenburg. Passionate about the next generation food system, and how to connect the wellbeing of the planet with the wellbeing of humans.

speakers.name: Sanne Ahlvin Kristenseb
speakers.description: We pride ourselves on offering a unique and delicious line of vegan cheese.
